languages.text: The wielder, when using {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g}, no longer deals damage to allies, they gain temporary hits equal to {uip|Temporary Health|cfcdc76467f741da8c00e5011b56573c}.

traits.locale_text: The wielder, when using {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g}, no longer deals damage to allies, they gain temporary hits equal to {uip|Temporary Health|cfcdc76467f741da8c00e5011b56573c}.

languages.text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.
languages.original_text: Способность персонажа {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Пронзающий взгляд{/g} не наносит урон союзникам. Вместо этого они получают {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} временного здоровья.

traits.locale_text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

languages.text: 装备者的{g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}无睑凝视{/g}技能不再会对受影响的盟友造成伤害。相反，所有受影响的盟友都会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点临时生命值。
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: 装备者的{g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}无睑凝视{/g}技能不再会对受影响的盟友造成伤害。相反，所有受影响的盟友都会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点临时生命值。

languages.text: La capacité {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Regard sans paupières{/g} de l'utilisateur n'inflige plus de dégâts aux alliés affectés, mais leur confère à la place un bonus de {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} aux blessures temporaires.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: La capacité {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Regard sans paupières{/g} de l'utilisateur n'inflige plus de dégâts aux alliés affectés, mais leur confère à la place un bonus de {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} aux blessures temporaires.

languages.text: La capacidad {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Mirada sin párpados{/g} del portador ya no inflige daño a los aliados afectados. En lugar de eso, dichos aliados reciben {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} heridas temporales.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: La capacidad {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Mirada sin párpados{/g} del portador ya no inflige daño a los aliados afectados. En lugar de eso, dichos aliados reciben {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} heridas temporales.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}逃れ得ぬ眼差し{/g}アビリティは、影響を受けた味方にダメージを与えなくなる。代わりに、その味方は{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}の一時的な傷を得る。
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の{g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}逃れ得ぬ眼差し{/g}アビリティは、影響を受けた味方にダメージを与えなくなる。代わりに、その味方は{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}の一時的な傷を得る。

languages.text: Takan kişinin {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Fal Taşı Bakış{/g} kabiliyeti, etkilenen dost birimlere artık hasar vermez. Aynı dost birimler, onun yerine {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} geçici sağlık puanı kazanır.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişinin {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Fal Taşı Bakış{/g} kabiliyeti, etkilenen dost birimlere artık hasar vermez. Aynı dost birimler, onun yerine {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} geçici sağlık puanı kazanır.

languages.text: Способность персонажа {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Пронзающий взгляд{/g} не наносит урон союзникам. Вместо этого они получают {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} временного здоровья.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: Способность персонажа {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Пронзающий взгляд{/g} не наносит урон союзникам. Вместо этого они получают {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} временного здоровья.
Способность персонажа {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Пронзающий взгляд{/g} не наносит урон союзникам. Вместо этого они получают {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} временного здоровья.

languages.text: Die Fähigkeit {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidloses Starren{/g} des Trägers fügt den betroffenen Verbündeten keinen Schaden mehr zu. Stattdessen erhalten diese Verbündeten {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporäre Wunden.
languages.original_text: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: Die Fähigkeit {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidloses Starren{/g} des Trägers fügt den betroffenen Verbündeten keinen Schaden mehr zu. Stattdessen erhalten diese Verbündeten {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporäre Wunden.
